sources.title: Fighting Chance | Full Action Drama Movie | MMA Fighter | Adam Hightower
sources.description:
Fighting Chance - An expectant first-time father and small-town MMA fighter who worked his entire life for a shot at the title is given the chance to see his dream come true. But when life throws him a strong left hook that threatens not only his dream but his life, he is forced to face the most difficult battle yet. Questioning his faith, and angry with God, he desperately looks for answers but realizes the only way to overcome and find his true purpose is to lean into the very thing he’s turned his back on, faith.
2022.  Stars: Sashleigha Hightower, Shawn Stevens, Adam Hightower
*Licensed from Bridgestone Multimedia Group. All rights reserved*
